entry.title: WINTER STORM WATCH, Portage la Prairie
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:35 a.m. CDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this morning. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 5. Wind chill near minus 16. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:04 AM CDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 5:04 AM CDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 2.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy in the morning. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 early in the afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:04 AM CDT Monday 3 April 2023
